title: Attempting to reconnect at 20 ping?
body:
For the past 2-3 weeks now, ive been going into games, and every now and then, ill suddenly get "Attempting to reconnect", even though my ping is at a steady 20.

Anyone have a fix for this, or at least any idea what's happening?

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be having a bit of instability between your network and our game servers if the game needs to keep reconnecting you multiple times. Even if your home network is in tip-top shape, it can sometimes have a hard time reaching specific servers.

Check out our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get that connection smoothed out. Let me know if you still have troubles staying in game!
